body.raw:
{"owner":"gs036r","typeName":"pm_sub22_processor-v1-gs036r","typeVersion":1,"blueprintTemplate":"# blueprint_version: 1.0.1
# description: PM Sub Processor mS for subscribing the data from local DMaaP, DR or MR, processing them and publishing them as PM files to local DMaaP DR
tosca_definitions_version: cloudify_dsl_1_3
imports:
- http://www.getcloudify.org/spec/cloudify/3.4/types.yaml
- http://dockercentral.it.att.com:8093/nexus/repository/rawcentral/com.att.dcae.controller/type_files/dockerplugin/3.0.0/node-type.yaml
- http://dockercentral.it.att.com:8093/nexus/repository/rawcentral/com.att.dcae.controller/type_files/dmaap/1.2.0+t.0.9/dmaap.yaml
- http://dockercentral.it.att.com:8093/nexus/repository/rawcentral/com.att.dcae.controller/type_files/relationship/1.0.0+t.0.1/relationship-types.yaml
inputs:
  DCAE_CEILOMETER_PM_DATA_feed5_feed_id:
    type: string
  DCAE_CEILOMETER_RAW_DATA_feed2_feed_id:
    type: string
  DCAE_SAM_GUEST_OS_feed1_feed_id:
    type: string
  DCAE_VCC_GUEST_OS_feed4_feed_id:
    type: string
  DCAE_VOIP_ATT_vIRC_PM_DATA_feed3_feed_id:
    type: string
  aai_broker_port:
    type: string
    default: ''
  aai_broker_url:
    type: string
    default: ''
  dcae_service_location:
    type: string
  docker_host_override:
    type: string
    default: ''
  sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_aaf_password:
    type: string
  sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_aaf_username:
    type: string
  sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_client_role:
    type: string
  sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_fqtn:
    type: string
node_templates:
  PMSubProcessor_1.0.1_PMSubProcessor_1.0.1:
    type: dcae.nodes.DockerContainerForComponentsUsingDmaap
    properties:
      application_config:
        aai_broker_port:
          get_input: aai_broker_port
        aai_broker_url:
          get_input: aai_broker_url
        isSelfServeComponent: false
        services_calls: {}
        streams_publishes:
          DCAE_CEILOMETER_PM_DATA:
            dmaap_info: <<feed5>>
            type: data_router
          DCAE_VCC_GUEST_OS:
            dmaap_info: <<feed4>>
            type: data_router
          DCAE_VOIP_ATT_vIRC_PM_DATA:
            dmaap_info: <<feed3>>
            type: data_router
        streams_subscribes:
          DCAE_CEILOMETER_RAW_DATA:
            dmaap_info: <<feed2>>
            type: data_router
          DCAE_SAM_GUEST_OS:
            dmaap_info: <<feed1>>
            type: data_router
          sec-measurement-output-vIRC:
            aaf_password:
              get_input: sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_aaf_password
            aaf_username:
              get_input: sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_aaf_username
            dmaap_info: <<topic0>>
            type: message_router
        useDtiConfig: false
      docker_config:
        healthcheck:
          interval: 60s
          script: /opt/app/vcc/bin/common/HealthCheck_PmSubProcessor.sh
          timeout: 20s
          type: docker
        volumes:
        - container:
            bind: /opt/app/dcae-certificate
          host:
            path: /opt/app/dcae-certificate
        - container:
            bind: /opt/logs/DCAE/dmd
          host:
            path: /opt/logs/DCAE/__PTYLOCATIONID__/pmsubprocessor/__CTXDEPLOYMENTID__/dmd
        - container:
            bind: /opt/app/vcc/logs/DCAE
          host:
            path: /opt/logs/DCAE/__PTYLOCATIONID__/pmsubprocessor/__CTXDEPLOYMENTID__
        - container:
            bind: /opt/app/vcc/archive
          host:
            path: /opt/data/DCAE/__PTYLOCATIONID__/pmsubprocessor/__CTXDEPLOYMENTID__/archive
      image: dockercentral.it.att.com:5100/com.att.dcae.controller/dcae-controller-pm-sub-processor-v2:18.06-002
      location_id:
        get_input: dcae_service_location
      service_component_type: dcae.collectors.pm.subprocessor
      streams_publishes:
      - location:
          get_input: dcae_service_location
        name: feed3
        type: data_router
      - location:
          get_input: dcae_service_location
        name: feed4
        type: data_router
      - location:
          get_input: dcae_service_location
        name: feed5
        type: data_router
      streams_subscribes:
      - client_role:
          get_input: sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_client_role
        location:
          get_input: dcae_service_location
        name: topic0
        route: sec-measurement-output-vIRC
        scheme: https
        type: message_router
      - location:
          get_input: dcae_service_location
        name: feed1
        route: DCAE_SAM_GUEST_OS
        scheme: https
        type: data_router
      - location:
          get_input: dcae_service_location
        name: feed2
        route: DCAE_CEILOMETER_RAW_DATA
        scheme: https
        type: data_router
    relationships:
    - target: docker_host_host
      type: dcae.relationships.component_contained_in
    - target: topic0
      type: dcae.relationships.subscribe_to_events
    - target: feed1
      type: dcae.relationships.subscribe_to_files
    - target: feed2
      type: dcae.relationships.subscribe_to_files
    - target: feed3
      type: dcae.relationships.publish_files
    - target: feed4
      type: dcae.relationships.publish_files
    - target: feed5
      type: dcae.relationships.publish_files
  docker_host_host:
    type: dcae.nodes.SelectedDockerHost
    properties:
      docker_host_override:
        get_input: docker_host_override
      location_id:
        get_input: dcae_service_location
  feed1:
    type: dcae.nodes.ExistingFeed
    properties:
      feed_id:
        get_input: DCAE_SAM_GUEST_OS_feed1_feed_id
  feed2:
    type: dcae.nodes.ExistingFeed
    properties:
      feed_id:
        get_input: DCAE_CEILOMETER_RAW_DATA_feed2_feed_id
  feed3:
    type: dcae.nodes.ExistingFeed
    properties:
      feed_id:
        get_input: DCAE_VOIP_ATT_vIRC_PM_DATA_feed3_feed_id
  feed4:
    type: dcae.nodes.ExistingFeed
    properties:
      feed_id:
        get_input: DCAE_VCC_GUEST_OS_feed4_feed_id
  feed5:
    type: dcae.nodes.ExistingFeed
    properties:
      feed_id:
        get_input: DCAE_CEILOMETER_PM_DATA_feed5_feed_id
  topic0:
    type: dcae.nodes.ExistingTopic
    properties:
      fqtn:
        get_input: sec-measurement-output-vIRC_topic0_fqtn","serviceIds":[],"vnfTypes":[],"serviceLocations":[]}
